title: Low-dose radiation therapy improves delivery of therapeutic nanoparticles to brain tumors

title_detail.value: Low-dose radiation therapy improves delivery of therapeutic nanoparticles to brain tumors

summary: Radiation therapy may increase the uptake of therapeutic nanoparticles by glioblastomas, raising the possibility of using both growth-factor-targeted and immune-system-based therapies against the deadly brain tumor, according to a new study.

summary_detail.value: Radiation therapy may increase the uptake of therapeutic nanoparticles by glioblastomas, raising the possibility of using both growth-factor-targeted and immune-system-based therapies against the deadly brain tumor, according to a new study.
